title: Bug 18705: Excessive flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has too much flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window vertically. 
3. Observe the flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
